description: A short hike starting from the entrance to the Castlegar Golf Club entrance  with great views over Castlegar and the Columbia River Valley
directions:
Turn uphill off highway 3A to the west of the Castlegar airport, follow the T
signs to the Castlegar Golf Course, turn left just before or after the gates, 
(depending on the time of year and whether the gates are open!)
title: Dove Hill
